doc:doc.doc:summary: An interface for updating the user's status.

doc:description.doc:para: Update the user's status to @status_message. The update will be performed asynchronously. The #StatusUpdate::StatusUpdated signal will be fired when complete.

doc:description.doc:para: Emitted when the status has been updated on the remote service. The @success signal indicates whether the update was successful.
